attributes.action: Fraud. I would like any/all MPs that have committed fraud against myself/general public as there employer by gaining money fraudulently for properties etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that as the employer of MPs they should be taken to court for fraud concerning their claims on properties etc. I as a member of the public would (having committed the same crime) be arrested, WHY AR'NT THEY????? MINISTERS ARE NOT ABOVE THE LAW OF THE LAND

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Also, please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
